title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Language Training Manager Leadership Course for Remote Education Supervision

context.prior_knowledge: Basic operational proficiency in online learning platforms (LMS) and experience in language education planning
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design a monitoring system for language education courses in remote environments
Learners can analyze learner progress and establish intervention strategies using LMS data
Learners can propose methods to maintain learner motivation through asynchronous feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
